column5: ENB ENBCA As the negative court decision on L3R settles I would expect L3R to be delay at minimum to H121 But fundamentals and outlook except for L3R continues to be bullish as long as crude stays above 45 Seasonal demand is gonna lend some strength to crude prices but pressure from geopolitical issues impacting trade can be a real monkey wrenchIm looking to accumulate below C4620
